name: Snake Shooter (Super Lambda)
description:
This is my first attempt to make a game! I'm making a third-person Shoot-em-up game, you control a space ship to destroy other ships. 

This game is just a prototype, it has only one simple level, and it has no sound effect yet. But I'll try my best to develop it little by little. So feel free to send me your advises! 

Thanks for paying for the game! Your paying is very very important to the development of this game! Thanks a lot!
